topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53a5127563687234f0880000#post_53a5127563687234f0880000
Off the top of my head I can only think of ONE alien I would want to sleep with.
!http://img4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120319195658/masseffect/images/0/0d/ME3_Garrus_Normandy.png!
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53a5124063687232b45c0000#post_53a5124063687232b45c0000
*I turn you into a great soft jelly thing. Smoothly rounded, with no mouth, with pulsing white holes filled by fog where your eyes used to be. Rubbery appendages that were once your arms, bulks rounding down into legless humps of soft slippery matter. You leave a moist trail as you move. Blotches of diseased, evil gray come and go on your surface as though light is beamed from within.*

*You have no mouth, and you must scream*
topics.author: 50b70eeb7f123b1a02000097

*Getter rays manage to somehow reserve this*

Okay, I'm not going through either of those again*

*Transforms the Bahamut to robot form*

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53a5127563687234f0880000#post_53a5127563687234f0880000
I certainly would.

You know what I think would be a good twist on the sapient AI story? If it was actually more moral than the people who built it. Why is it that people who write scifi always equate more than human intelligence with more than human malevolence?

"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53a512c66368723238710000#post_53a512c66368723238710000
I differ from you on this personally. I'd go for Wrex. Garrus is a bro, but not my type. Also I always romance Tali, because she is just so goddamn adorable.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7

"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53a512c66368723238710000#post_53a512c66368723238710000
Thus my point is proven; us as a species are well known for sticking our dicks in everything and I mean EVERYTHING.
Hell chances are someone would stick their dick in a dinosaur if they were brought back or someone would stick their dick in a female looking mecha.

"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53a513b3636872356c090100#post_53a513b3636872356c090100
I'd just like to point out that our willingness to stick our dicks in everything is what makes us succesful as a species, and if an alien race survived long enough for space travel they probably have the same urge.

*LET THE INTERSTELLAR ORGY COMMENCE*
